post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer the LET community the following dedicated server promotion. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services.
  
**--Dedicated Servers--**  
- SynergyCP Control Panel
- Automated OS Installs
- IP KVM
- Remote Reboot
- 4Gbps DDoS Protection  

**E3-1271v3 Dedicated Server**  
* E3-1271v3 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.6GHz / 4.00GHz Turbo  
* 16GB DDR3  
* 500GB HDD  (Drive upgrades available)
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  OR 100Mbps Unmetered
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)  
* $34/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=88&promocode=1271V3-39) [Promocode: 1271V3-39]      
  
  
Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.  
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/  
    
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
     
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
